About Me

Let me tell you a little about me

BIO

Recent grad with overwhelming passion for technology. Currently working on social media website using vue. I have a deep interest in gaming platforms and the technology behind it. Really excited for what the future holds for technology in gaming. As of right now, I am a barista/ cashier, interacting with customers and communicating with coworkers to provide the best service possible.
